ModelLayer.MapML

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ModelLayer.MapML.MapModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EasyMapML, MediumMapML

    public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for all the maps' model representation. By itself, does not describe any sensible map. A child must be used for that purpose.

    • Field Detail

      • _MapObjects

        static java.util.ArrayList<MapObject> _MapObjects
        Contains the MapObjects which are used for collision detection. MapObjects are objects of a map a car can collide with (edge of the racing track, grass, etc)

      • CAR_Starting_Angle

        int CAR_Starting_Angle
        Represents the cars starting angle, whereby 0 is a car facing north. This number must match with one of the elements of the SharedResources.CAR_Simulated_Angle_Values array.

      • CAR_StartingPoint_X_Player1

        int CAR_StartingPoint_X_Player1
        The X coordinate of the starting point for the player 1 car.

      • CAR_StartingPoint_Y_Player1

        int CAR_StartingPoint_Y_Player1
        The Y coordinate of the starting point for the player 1 car.

      • CAR_StartingPoint_X_Player2

        int CAR_StartingPoint_X_Player2
        The X coordinate of the starting point for the player 2 car.

      • CAR_StartingPoint_Y_Player2

        int CAR_StartingPoint_Y_Player2
        The Y coordinate of the starting point for the player 2 car.

      • MAP_TextureFile

        java.lang.String MAP_TextureFile
        The file path for the texture file (background image) of the map.
